verses.text: \w My|strong="G1722"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* respect \w of|strong="G1391"\w* persons.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G1437"\w* \w assembly|strong="G4864"\w* \w a|strong="G1437"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* having \w a|strong="G1437"\w* golden \w ring|strong="G5554"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fine|strong="G2986"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1437"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* mean \w attire|strong="G2066"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* respect \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G2476"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* clothed \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fine|strong="G2986"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G2476"\w*: \w Sit|strong="G2521"\w* thou \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* \w man|strong="G4434"\w*: \w Stand|strong="G2476"\w* thou \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w my|strong="G5259"\w* \w footstool|strong="G5286"\w*:

\w Do|strong="G1096"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w judge|strong="G2923"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w judges|strong="G2923"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* unjust \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w*?

Hearken, \w my|strong="G0191"\w* dearest \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*: hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* dishonoured \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* \w man|strong="G4145"\w*. \w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* oppress \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w draw|strong="G1670"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* judgment seats?

\w Do|strong="G3756"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w blaspheme|strong="G0987"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* invoked \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* then \w you|strong="G4771"\w* fulfill \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w royal|strong="G0937"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*, Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* thy neighbour \w as|strong="G5613"\w* thyself; \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* respect \w to|strong="G3551"\w* persons, \w you|strong="G1487"\w* commit \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, being \w reproved|strong="G1651"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w transgressors|strong="G3848"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* whosoever shall \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* offend \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* point, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w guilty|strong="G1777"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* kill. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w do|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* shalt kill, thou art \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w transgressor|strong="G3848"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* ye, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* being \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* \w to|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*. \w And|strong="G4160"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* exalteth itself above \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w profit|strong="G3786"\w*, \w my|strong="G2192"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*? Shall \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w be|strong="G1410"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w a|strong="G1437"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* want \w daily|strong="G2184"\w* \w food|strong="G5160"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Go|strong="G5217"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w be|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w warmed|strong="G2328"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filled|strong="G5526"\w*; \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w necessary|strong="G2006"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w profit|strong="G3786"\w*?

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w it|strong="G1437"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w itself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w will|strong="G5100"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: Thou hast \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G4102"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*: shew \w me|strong="G3004"\w* thy \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*; \w and|strong="G4102"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G5100"\w* shew thee, \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w my|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

Thou believest \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. Thou dost \w well|strong="G2573"\w*: \w the|strong="G3588"\w* devils \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* tremble.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* wilt thou \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* dead?

\w Was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w our|strong="G0011"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, offering \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*?

Seest thou, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* did co-operate \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G5048"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* reputed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w a|strong="G3708"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G3668"\w* \w manner|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Rahab|strong="G4460"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="G4204"\w*, \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* she \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, receiving \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w messengers|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sending \w them|strong="G1544"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.
